targets.query:
import "strings"

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_time_grid" or r["_field"] == "real_time_home" or r["_field"] == "real_time_pv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_time_pv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_time_home")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_time_grid")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "standard_usage_prediction": (float(v: (int(v: ${positive_energy_balance_date}) - int(v: r._time)))/1000000000.0/86400.0*${standard_energy_grid_usage_per_day} ) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "accumulated_energy": (r.meter_energy_produced-${internal_meter_start_energy_produced})*${rate_of_return}-(r.meter_energy_consumed-${internal_meter_start_energy_consumed})+(${external_meter_start_energy_produced}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_produced}*1000.0)*${rate_of_return}-(${external_meter_start_energy_consumed}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_consumed}*1000.0)+${additional_power_to_use}*1000.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Accumulated energy": r.accumulated_energy }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Energy to use": r.accumulated_energy - r.standard_usage_prediction }))
  |> drop(columns: ["meter_energy_produced", "meter_energy_consumed", "standard_usage_prediction", "accumulated_energy"])

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.meter_energy_produced-${internal_meter_start_energy_produced})*${rate_of_return}-(r.meter_energy_consumed-${internal_meter_start_energy_consumed})+(${external_meter_start_energy_produced}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_produced}*1000.0)*${rate_of_return}-(${external_meter_start_energy_consumed}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_consumed}*1000.0) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["meter_energy_produced", "meter_energy_consumed"])
  |> difference()

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_produced: "To grid", total_production: "Total production"})

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_produced: "To grid", total_production: "Total production"})

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_produced: "To grid", total_production: "Total production"})

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Total consumed": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced+r.meter_energy_consumed }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_consumed: "From grid"})
  |> drop(columns: ["total_production", "meter_energy_produced"])

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Total consumed": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced+r.meter_energy_consumed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_consumed: "From grid"})
  |> drop(columns: ["total_production", "meter_energy_produced"])

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "total_production" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Total consumed": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced+r.meter_energy_consumed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Consumed directly": r.total_production-r.meter_energy_produced }))
  |> rename(columns: {meter_energy_consumed: "From grid"})
  |> drop(columns: ["total_production", "meter_energy_produced"])

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.meter_energy_produced-${internal_meter_start_energy_produced})*${rate_of_return}-(r.meter_energy_consumed-${internal_meter_start_energy_consumed})+(${external_meter_start_energy_produced}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_produced}*1000.0)*${rate_of_return}-(${external_meter_start_energy_consumed}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_consumed}*1000.0) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["meter_energy_produced", "meter_energy_consumed"])
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Day balance": (r._value )}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "balancer")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meter_energy_produced" or r["_field"] == "meter_energy_consumed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.meter_energy_produced-${internal_meter_start_energy_produced})*${rate_of_return}-(r.meter_energy_consumed-${internal_meter_start_energy_consumed})+(${external_meter_start_energy_produced}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_produced}*1000.0)*${rate_of_return}-(${external_meter_start_energy_consumed}*1000.0-${external_meter_bill_energy_consumed}*1000.0) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["meter_energy_produced", "meter_energy_consumed"])
  |> difference()
  |> timedMovingAverage(every: 1d, period: 4w)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "Average 4W": (r._value )}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "real_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r["_field"], prefix: "meter_power_real_phase_"))
